0.Pros: It's an organized, clean, and we have a large work area in every different work station. Everything is in one spot. Everything has a spot so it makes it easier when you're stocking.

5.Pros: The Best reason to work at McDonald's is the team you get to work with. My fellow managers and crew are awesome. We work together as a team and that's what makes the job flow so smoothly. It makes for a great day at work. I love my team, they're my McFamily.
5.Cons: The only cons I have where I work are, the xtra time you have to stay over because of people not showing up for work, and having to train people that don't want to work and end up quiting and just wasting your time and everyone else's time because they found out what hard work was like.
